review: OMG when I heard anyone could do it, I laughed and laughed. I finally decided to give it a try ... probably spending an afternoon cursing how no good it was !! WRONG !! I could not believe that I actually got this installed and operational in no time. It was easy. I've tried other electronics that were supposed to be a zip to install  (wrong) well this one really is. I just don't know what else to say except, I did it myself ...yeah !!  I told my friend she could do it too. Well now there are 2 total dummies when it comes to this stuff, that hooked this fire stick up to the tv with no problems, and are now watching  all the great shows, listening to music and soon gonna start playing games. Amazon thanks! Next is the voice remote ......hope that's just as easy. We'll see.
